name: Projectile Control - 4K
description:
Credits to Kyatric for his Missile Command tutorial.

Credit to morsprinstock for the gigantic meteor (you'll know it when you see it.)

I wanted to create a project in 4k resolution... despite not having a 4k monitor. I think I was just bored.

But please enjoy - except as noted above, all art and music by Seothen/Kyle Murphy, 2020.
